document.full_text: around 450,000 people who work for u.s. states, counties, cities, towns and villages could get pink slips in fiscal 2012, sharply up from the 300,000 positions shed this year, a report said on monday.
document.title: state and local governments may cut 450,000 jobs in fy2012
lines_and_colors: around 450,000 people who work for u.s. states, counties, cities, towns and villages could get pink slips in fiscal 2012, sharply up from the 300,000 positions shed this year, a report said on monday.
